alert.note: Alert for Garfield; Holt; Wheeler (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 31 at 12:49AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Garfield, southern Holt and Wheeler Counties through 145 AM CDT... At 1248 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong gust front along a line extending from 13 miles east of Rose to near Burwell. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Burwell, O`Neill, Chambers, Bartlett, Ericson, Amelia, Inman, Buffalo Flats, Carson Lake, Sunfish Lake, Cumminsville, Four Corners, Pibel Lake State Recreation Area, Deverre and Gables. This includes the following highways... Highway 20 between mile markers 304 and 321. Highway 281 between mile markers 132 and 185. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
